name: 曾恕銘
objective: This course covers the basics and latest developments in information and communication technology (ICT), including multimedia, communications, and networks. Recent advances (Byond 5G(B5G)/6G) of machine learning applications in ICT are covered.
schedule:
1.  Network Protocols (Internet engineering)
2. IT  source coding for video standards (Huffman code etc.)
3. Information theory and channel coding introduction
4. Convolutional/RS codes for 4G control channel
5. (optional)  Turbo codes for 4G traffic channel15. 
6. LDPC codes/Polar codes for 5G
7. Multiple access protocols in layer 2 (CSMA/CA with RTS/CTS for Wi-Fi etc.)
8. Error resilience in wireless video transmission(HARQ(RCPC+CRC), MDC, Cross-layer control, optimization theory (including linear programming))
9. Cross layer resource allocation OFDNA/NOMA B5G/6G
10. Deep Reinforcement Learning  (DRL)
11. MEC B5G/6G resource allocation Taskd Offloading DRL-DQN DDQN
12. RIS B5G/6G DRL-SAC
13. (optional) D2D overlaying IoT unsupervised GNN  
14. (optional) D2D underlaying IoT BB SVM imitation learning
15. (optional) Video Chaptering Summarization  NTOU 20241022 talk
